thread.title: Girls Just Wanna Have Funds: Why There is No Such Thing as a Gold Digger
thread.title_full: Girls Just Wanna Have Funds: Why There is No Such Thing as a Gold Digger

author: Soraya Joseph
title: Girls Just Wanna Have Funds: Why There is No Such Thing as a Gold Digger
text:
Girls Just Wanna Have Funds: Why There is No Such Thing as a Gold Digger It's time to ditch the term. by Soraya Joseph 3h ago 
It’s that time of the year again! NBA All-Star 2017 weekend is just days away and the games are about to begin in more ways than one. Bigger than the actual Sunday game itself, is the festive frolic of stars and fans alike to some of the most exclusive parties in the city. This year their doing it big in New Orleans. During this time, many female attendees are often outed as “groupies or gold diggers” for partaking in the fun, and we’re here to call foul on the BS bias. 
Check out the HBIC’s of having no shame in their game discuss everything from sex to vaginal rejuvenation:
